channel.title: Compiler javac error
channel.description: someone plz help. im running on vista, comp doesnt recognize "javac", im using jdk and jre 6u12

item.title: Compiler javac error
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

By setting your environmental variables the way you did, it isn’t reading javac by itself. You’re going to have to include the JDK version in the compiler.bat file as well.

@echo off title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause you just have to refer to where your jdk is located, including the version you use. change the version to the one you have downloaded.

Read full topic
